item.title: Spork: Probabilistic Bitcoin Soft Forks
item.description: Introduction Thank you for the introduction. I have a secret. I am not an economist, so you’ll have to forgive me if I don’t have your favorite annotations today. I have my own annotations. I originally gave a predecessor to this talk in Japan. You might notice my title here is a haiku: these are protocols used for changing the bitcoin netwokr protocols. People do highly value staying together for a chain, we’re doing coordinated activation of a new upgrade.
